sentences.en: " No, " returned Minnie softly, and rattling the dishes to drown the conversation.
sentences.cn: “ 不, " 敏妮轻轻说道.她故意把碗碟弄出声响来掩盖她们的谈话声."他不会去的.

sentences.en: 1 f the enemy overtook them , they would drown themselves in the river.
sentences.cn: 假如敌人追上了, 就跳到水里去死吧!

sentences.en: A child can drown in only a few inches of water.
sentences.cn: 儿童在只有几英寸深的水中就可能溺亡。

sentences.en: All he could do for the moment was to drown his sorrows in his brandy.
sentences.cn: 因此他现在只能姑且喝几口酒.

sentences.en: Animals get tangled in fishing nets and drown.
sentences.cn: 动物被缠进渔网里淹死了。

sentences.en: But I am alive, and not drown'd as all my ship's company was.
sentences.cn: 唯我独生, 船上同伴皆葬身海底.
不要在我的威士忌酒里加太多的水.

sentences.en: Every bamboo blind was drown to keep out the relentless sun.
sentences.cn: 所有的竹帘都放下来,抵挡毒热的阳光.

sentences.en: He can drown all conversations out.
sentences.cn: 他能盖过所有的人的谈话.

sentences.en: He tried to recollect things and drown himself in them.
sentences.cn: 他极力回想过去的事情而沉浸于回忆之中.

sentences.en: He was afraid, because of his great weakness, that he might fall in and drown.
sentences.cn: 他怕自己会由于极度虚弱, 跌进去淹死.

sentences.en: I can't bear to see the pretty babes drown before my eyes.
sentences.cn: 我不忍亲眼看着这两个可爱的婴儿淹死.

sentences.en: It is cruel to drown the cat in the river.
sentences.cn: 把猫淹死在河里是残忍的.

sentences.en: Jane was drowned in the river.
sentences.cn: 简在那条河里溺水身亡。

sentences.en: Many people drowned when the boat overturned.
she arrived at the church looking like a drowned rat.
sentences.cn: 她到教堂时像个落汤鸡一样。

sentences.en: She was afraid lest he might drown.
The loud cheers drown out his shouts.
sentences.cn: 欢呼声盖过了他的喊叫声.

trans.tran_en: to die from being under water for too long, or to kill someone in this way
